title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
description: The bug report is about the behavior of the report design when including a library. Currently, the report design stores the absolute path of the library, but it should save the relative path instead.
OB: Currently, when I include a library in a report design, I see that the report design stores the absolute path of the library instead of the relative path. For example, <property name="fileName" value="/E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary"/>
EB: The expected behavior is that the report designer should generate and save the relative path when a library is included in the report design. For example, if my report design is located at $project/test and I include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary, the report design should store the relative path to the library, like <property name="fileName" value="../otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary"/>.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Create or open a report design.
3. Include a library by selecting 'Library' from the menu and choosing the library file.
4. Save the report design.

Expected result:
The <property> tag for the included library should contain the relative path instead of the absolute path.
